episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_020:
I’ve heard that when Tsareena win battles, they
show off with a loud laugh.
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_030: Right, I’d heard that, too, but...
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_040:
She really seems like an actual queen. I could
learn a thing or two from her!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_050:
Gwaaah?! But Antique Form Polteageist is right
there in front of me!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_060: I’ll just have to try again with different Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_070:
That’s enough! I’m afraid we won’t tolerate you
being a nuisance!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_080:
Taking things from others is stealing! And we
won’t hold back against a thief!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_090: Grrr... I guess this is as far as I go...
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_100: Aww... I wish I had an Antique Form Polteageist...
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_110: I really thought I’d finally get a real Polteageist...
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_120: OK, that’s enough! You need to apologize!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_130:
Yes, it’s only natural that she’d be angry. You
tried to steal her dear partner Pokémon.
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_140:
I’m...sorry. Seeing something so rare, I just
couldn’t help myself.
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_150: No! It’s not me you need to apologize to!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_170: Tell your Polteageist that you’re sorry!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_180:
That Polteageist battled as hard as it could—and
all for your sake.
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_190:
But right in front of that loyal partner, all you can
talk about is Antique Form Polteageist!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_200:
Who cares if it’s the Antique Form or the
Phony Form?
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_210:
Phony Form or not, that Polteageist is yours, and
that’s what makes it authentic!
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_230:
How very like you, Lillie. What excellent words
of wisdom.
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_240:
Yes, you’re right. This partner of mine has traveled
all over Pasio with me.
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_260:
You’re the only real Polteageist for me. So please,
keep being my partner...
episode_event_specialcos02/4001_1001_270: You mean you’ll forgive me? Thank you so much!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_010:
By the way, I had no idea that only Antique
Form Polteageist had that mark!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_020: That’s right, Ingo! Neither one of us knew that!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_050:
I knew it had a mark on the bottom, but I just
assumed that all the others did, too.
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_060:
I thought you knew how to tell them apart, Lillie.
That’s why I wouldn’t let you answer.
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_070:
Oh, but I’m sure I would have known which is
mine even without seeing the mark!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_080: After all, it’s my partner Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_090: Hmm... As a researcher, I wonder about that.
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_100:
Why don’t we test that, Lillie? Can you really tell
your partner apart from all the others?
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_130:
Bravo! There’s a real bond between you two
for sure!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_140: Aww, you’re making me blush... Thank you!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_150:
Hmm... Polteageist is often seen as a pest, so it
usually disguises itself as kitchenware...
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_160:
But I think I can see why this one chose to show
itself to Lillie.
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_170:
But anyway, congratulations once again on
solving all our puzzles! And now, what we’ve all
been waiting for...
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_190: Tea and sweets await! Everyone smile!
episode_event_specialcos02/4002_1001_200: Let’s enjoy every minute of this fabulous tea party!
